code: /** this code is made by ConanYu* Problem: 1001* Verdict: Accepted* Submission Date: 2017-11-15 23:02:38* Time: 20 MS* Memory: 2020 KB*/#include<bits/stdc++.h>/*#include<fstream>#include<iomanip>//set precision*/using namespace std;int main(){  /*    cout << setprecision(2);    cout.setf(ios::fixed);    //set precision*/    int zz;    cin>>zz;    for(int iz=0;iz<zz;iz++)    {        string s;        cin>>s;        int size=s.size(),p=0;        for(int i=0;i<size;i++)        {            if(s[i]!='!')            {                if(p%2==0)                {                    cout<<s[i];                }                else                {                    if(s[i]>='a'&&s[i]<='z')                    {                        s[i]-=32;                        cout<<s[i];                    }                    else                    {                        s[i]+=32;                        cout<<s[i];                    }                }            }            else            {                p++;            }        }        printf("\n");    }    return 0;}
